Hi everyone,
I have a question for my neural ODE which is :
```
function dudt2(u,p,t)
  FastChain(
        (u,p) -> ifelse(t <= tc, c_int , 0) .- u,
            FastDense(1, 2, tanh),
        FastDense(2, 1))
end


function neural_ode_f(u,p,t)
  FastChain((u,p) -> ifelse(t <= tc,c_int , 0) .- u,
        FastDense(1, 2, tanh),
        FastDense(2, 1))(u,p)
end

pinit = initial_params(dudt2(u0,p_start,tbegin))
prob = ODEProblem(neural_ode_f, u0, tspan, pinit)```

Do you think that it understand the parameters p to learn ? Like this ODE 
```
function odeTK(du, u, p,t)
    if t <= tc
        du[1] = p[1]*c_int - p[2]u[1]
    else t > tc
        du[1] = -p[2]*(u[1])
    end
end```
And I’m not sure that it understand the if condition, because the result as the same when I only use

```
function dudt2(u,p,t)
  FastChain(
        (u,p) -> c_int .- u,
            FastDense(1, 2, tanh),
        FastDense(2, 1))
end


function neural_ode_f(u,p,t)
  FastChain((u,p) -> c_int .- u,
        FastDense(1, 2, tanh),
        FastDense(2, 1))(u,p)
end

pinit = initial_params(dudt2(u0,p_start,tbegin))
prob = ODEProblem(neural_ode_f, u0, tspan, pinit)```
Thank you for your help :smile:
